//

//

//
/sp\.analytics\.yahoo\.com/i,
//

/magiczoomplus\.5\.2\.4\.js/i
],
shouldSendCallback: function(data) {
//
//
//
//
if(window.chewyConf && window.chewyConf.isBot){
return false;
}
//
//
if(/CriOS/i.test(navigator.userAgent) && data.exception && data.exception.values){
//
for(var i = 0; i < data.exception.values.length; i++ ){
var e = data.exception.values[i];
if(e.type === 'SecurityError'
&& e.value.indexOf('Blocked a frame with origin') !== -1
&& e.value.indexOf('Protocols, domains, and ports must match.') !== -1){
return false;
}
}
}
//
//
if(window.location.search.indexOf("catchpoint=true") !== -1 ){
return false;
}
//TODO: filter out IE10 errors too.
var regexp = new RegExp('(\\s|^)ie-[89](\\s|$)');
//
if(document.body.className.match(regexp)){
return false;
}
return true;
},

// optimizelyClient will be undefined if customer is running adblock extension
if (window.optimizelyClient) {
(function(){
//TODO: provide our own logger that hooks into Sentry
window.chewy.optimizelyClient = window.optimizelyClient.createInstance({
datafile: window.chewyConf.optimizely.dataFile,
logLevel: parseInt($.cookie('cw-optilog'), 10) || 4
});
// Get browser name and OS name
// TODO: Duplicated from UserAgentUtils.kt - don't update one without the other - figure out how to import
// from com.chew.sfweb.utils.UserAgentUtils without script-loader issues in jspf and legacy js files.
var agent = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();
var browserName = "Unknown";
var OSName = "Unknown";
if (agent.indexOf("opera") !== -1) browserName = "Opera";
else if (agent.indexOf("msie") !== -1) browserName = "MSIE";
else if (agent.indexOf("chrome") !== -1) browserName = "Chrome";
else if (agent.indexOf("safari") !== -1) browserName = "Safari";
else if (agent.indexOf("firefox") !== -1) browserName = "Firefox";
if (agent.indexOf("windows") !== -1) OSName = "Windows";
else if (agent.indexOf("mac") !== -1) OSName = "MacOS";
else if (agent.indexOf("x11") !== -1) OSName = "UNIX";
else if (agent.indexOf("linux") !== -1) OSName = "Linux";
var commonAttributes = {
'isVisitor': (!window.chewyConf.isBot && !window.chewyConf.csr && !window.chewyConf.intranetUser).toString(),
'viewType': chewyConf.viewType,
'hasPurchased': chewyConf.hasPurchased.toString(),
'registeredUser': chewyConf.registeredUser.toString(),
'environment': chewyConf.environment,
'utmSource': window.chewyConf.sessionAcquisitionData.utm_source || "",
'utmMedium': window.chewyConf.sessionAcquisitionData.utm_medium || "",
'utmCampaign': window.chewyConf.sessionAcquisitionData.utm_campaign || "",
'utmTerm': window.chewyConf.sessionAcquisitionData.utm_term || "",
'utmContent': window.chewyConf.sessionAcquisitionData.utm_content || "",
'activeAutoship': window.chewy.userHasActiveAutoship.toString(),
'browserType': browserName,
'os': OSName,
'referralURL': window.chewyConf.sessionAcquisitionData.referer || ""
};
var _mergedAttributes = function(attrs){
return $.extend({}, commonAttributes, attrs);
};
window.chewy.optimizelyClient.safeTrack = function (eventKey, attributes, eventTags) {
return this.track(eventKey, window.chewyConf.personalizationId, _mergedAttributes(attributes), eventTags);
};
window.chewy.optimizelyClient.safeActivate = function (experimentKey, attributes) {
// Short circuit if there is an override in place for this experiment. Prevents
// calling activate if an override is in place.
if (window.chewyConf.optimizely.experimentOverrides[experimentKey]){
return window.chewyConf.optimizely.experimentOverrides[experimentKey]
}
if(this.configObj.experimentKeyMap[experimentKey] === undefined){
return null;
}
var keyName = 'optimizelyVariant_' + experimentKey + '_' + window.chewyConf.personalizationId;
var isStorageAvailable = window.chewy.storageAvailable();
var variantEntry = isStorageAvailable ? JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(keyName)) : null;
if (!variantEntry) {
var variantValue = this.activate(experimentKey, window.chewyConf.personalizationId, _mergedAttributes(attributes));
if (variantValue == null) {
return null;
}
variantEntry = JSON.stringify({
value: variantValue,
time: Date.now()
});
// TODO: SFW-6217 use callback instead to decouple
if (window.chewy && window.chewy.gaHelper) {
window.chewy.gaHelper.pushExperiment(experimentKey, variantValue);
}
if (isStorageAvailable) localStorage.setItem(keyName, variantEntry);
return variantValue;
}
return variantEntry.value;
};
window.chewy.optimizelyClient.getSafeVariation = function (experimentKey, attributes) {
// if an override is set, just pass back the override
if (window.chewyConf.optimizely.experimentOverrides[experimentKey]){
return window.chewyConf.optimizely.experimentOverrides[experimentKey]
}
if(this.configObj.experimentKeyMap[experimentKey] === undefined){
return null;
}
return this.getVariation(experimentKey, window.chewyConf.personalizationId, _mergedAttributes(attributes));
};
})();
}

if (pageType === 'browse-brands') pageType = 'brand-page';

'authenticationState': chewyConf.analyticsAuthenticationState,
});

Beneful Healthy Weight with Real Chicken Dry Dog Food, 31.1-lb bag","id":"46753","position":"28","dimension25":"false","category":"294","list":"browse","brand":"Purina Beneful"},{"price":"59.99","name":"Merrick Grain-Free Real Texas Beef \u0026 Sweet Potato Recipe Dry Dog Food, 25-lb bag","id":"62201","position":"29","dimension25":"false","category":"294","list":"browse","brand":"Merrick"},{"price":"56.69","name":"Natural Balance L.I.D. Limited Ingredient Diets Sweet Potato \u0026 Fish Formula Grain-Free Dry Dog Food, 26-lb bag","id":"76787","position":"30","dimension25":"false","category":"294","list":"browse","brand":"Natural Balance"},{"price":"49.99","name":"Blue Buffalo Life Protection Formula Adult Lamb \u0026 Brown Rice Recipe Dry Dog Food, 30-lb bag","id":"49557","position":"31","dimension25":"false","category":"294","list":"browse","brand":"Blue Buffalo"},{"price":"47.98","name":"Purina Pro Plan Sport All Life Stages Performance 30/20 Formula Dry Dog Food, 37.5-lb bag","id":"67708","position":"32","dimension25":"false","category":"294","list":"browse","brand":"Purina Pro Plan"},{"price":"49.99","name":"Taste of the Wild High Prairie Puppy Formula Grain-Free Dry Dog Food, 28-lb bag","id":"154555","position":"33","dimension25":"false","category":"294","list":"browse","brand":"Taste of the Wild"},{"price":"75.04","name":"Royal Canin Veterinary Diet Urinary SO Dry Dog Food, 25.3-lb bag","id":"49969","position":"34","dimension25":"false","category":"294","list":"browse","brand":"Royal Canin Veterinary Diet"},{"price":"34.99","name":"American Journey Salmon \u0026 Brown Rice Protein First Recipe Dry Dog Food, 28-lb bag","id":"109347","position":"35","dimension25":"false","category":"294","list":"browse","brand":"American Journey"},{"price":"42.74","name":"Purina ONE SmartBlend True Instinct with Real Turkey \u0026 Venison Adult Dry Dog Food, 36-lb bag","id":"126354","position":"36","dimension25":"false","category":"294","list":"browse","brand":"Purina ONE"}]
};
function ecom(ecommerce, listData) {
// First send the impression event itself
var batchId = Math.round(Math.random() * 100000000);
var impressionsList = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(ecommerce.impressions));
delete ecommerce.impressions; // Send the impressions data in the batch loop instead
dataLayer.push({
event: 'analyticsEvent',
eventCategory: 'eec',
eventAction: 'impression',
eventLabel: 'browse',
eventNonInt: true,
ecommerce: ecommerce,
batchId: batchId,
'list-category': listData['list-category'],
'list-page-number': listData['list-page-number'],
resultCount: window.chewy.pageData.resultCount,
searchOutputKeyword : getSearchOutputKeyword(),
searchInputKeyword : getSearchInputKeyword()
});
// Setup the ecommerce batch object as a clone of the ecommerce object but with an empty impressions array
var ecommBatch = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(ecommerce));
ecommBatch.impressions = [];
// Next, loop through the ecommerse impression items and send in batches of ten as "sendData" events
impressionsList.forEach(item => {
ecommBatch.impressions.push(item);
if (ecommBatch.impressions.length >= 12) {
dataLayer.push({
event: 'analyticsEvent',
eventCategory: 'eec',
eventAction: 'impression',
eventLabel: 'sendData',
eventNonInt: true,
ecommerce: JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(ecommBatch)),
batchId: batchId,
'list-category': listData['list-category'],
'list-page-number': listData['list-page-number']
});
ecommBatch.impressions = [];
}
});
// Send the final batch
if (ecommBatch.impressions.length) {
dataLayer.push({
event: 'analyticsEvent',
eventCategory: 'eec',
eventAction: 'impression',
eventLabel: 'sendData',
eventNonInt: true,
ecommerce: JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(ecommBatch)),
'list-category': listData['list-category'],
'list-page-number': listData['list-page-number']
});
}
}
function catId() {
// SFW-7318 Use JSTL to see if property getter exists on bean, via exception catch
return '332';
}
function getSearchInputKeyword() {
var searchKeywordEl = document.querySelector('[data-input-keyword]');
return searchKeywordEl ? searchKeywordEl.getAttribute('data-input-keyword') : null;
}
// TODO: This will need to change to return the appropriate list (relaxed search results) output keywords when
// TODO: we work on SFW-8277 and SFW-8278
function getSearchOutputKeyword() {
var searchKeywordEl = document.querySelector('[data-output-keyword]');
return searchKeywordEl ? searchKeywordEl.getAttribute('data-output-keyword') : null;
}
var listData = {
'list-category': window.chewy.pageType + (catId() ? '-' + catId() : ''),
'list-page-number': '1'
};
dataLayer.push(listData);
setTimeout(function() { // Wait for DOM to finish constructing
var domNodes = [].slice.call(document.querySelectorAll('.js-product-select'));
var pageNumber = document.querySelector('.cw-pagination--is-active, .cw-pagination__current-page');
pageNumber = pageNumber ? pageNumber.innerText.split('/')[0].trim() : '1';
// For deals, if they exist on page, overwrite eventData with custom dimensions
eventData.impressions = eventData.impressions.map(function(product, index) {
if (domNodes && domNodes[index]) {
product['p-deals-flag'] = (domNodes[index].querySelector('.badge-sale, .sale') ? 'yes' : 'no');
var savingsPromo = '';
[].slice.call(domNodes[index].querySelectorAll('.savings-promo')).forEach(function(promo) {
savingsPromo += promo.innerText + ' ';
});
product['dimension19'] = savingsPromo.trim() || 'no';
product['dimension20'] = pageNumber;
}
return product;
});
ecom(eventData, listData);
}, 250); // Wait for DOM to finish constructing
})(window);

.cat-ban-10-332 .img-banner--mobile {
background-image: url(//cms-www.chewy.com/contentAsset/raw-data/fda639b6-d867-4cfc-8ee6-e3c28c7ef260/mobileBanner/830a7e0e-3ba9-4de4-95be-faec10a6150e);
height: 125px;
background-size: cover;
background-position: center;
}
}

}

background-position: center;
}
}

});
.promo-banner-cta {
border: 0.1rem solid #dddddd;
border-radius: 0.4rem;
}
.promo-banner-cta .cw-display__show-on-small {
color: #797979;
text-align: right;
margin-right: 10px;
}
.promo-banner-cta .banlnk {
align-items: center;
}
.promo-banner-cta a:hover {
text-decoration: none;
}
.promo-banner-cta .cw-btn {
margin-right: -3px;
padding: 1.2rem 2.2rem;
}
bazadebezolkohpepadr="342638328"
(function(w, d, s, l, i) {
w[l] = w[l] || [];
w[l].push({
"gtm.start": new Date().getTime(),
event: "gtm.js"
});
var f = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
j = d.createElement(s),
dl = l != "dataLayer" ? "&l=" + l : "";
j.async = true;
j.src =
"https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=" +
i +
dl +
"";
f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
})(window, document, "script", "dataLayer", "GTM-5X325N");

$(document).on('click', '.js-gtm-proceed-to-checkout-dynamic', function () {
var productsArray = [];
$('#gaCartDomParent .ga-eec__container').each(function (index, item) {
productsArray.push(window.chewy.gaHelper.buildProductFieldObject(item));
});
dataLayer.push({
'event': 'analyticsEvent',
'eventCategory': 'eec',
'eventAction': 'checkout',
'ec:action': 'checkout',
'eventLabel': undefined,
'eventNonInt': true,
'ecommerce': {
'checkout': {
'actionField': {
'step': 1
},
'products': productsArray
}
}
});
});

Dog Food
Your four-legged friend rewards you in many ways. Whether it’s accompanying you on a brisk jog to help you stay in shape, or giving you a cuddle when you need it most, there’s no denying how rewarding a pup can be. Show your appreciation and reward your furry friend with the foods and dog treats they crave.
Chewy carries a wide range of delicious dog foods and tasty dog treats for your precious pup. When it comes to choosing a dog food, you may find all the options overwhelming. Let us help you find the best one with dog food reviews, ingredient information, and personal one-on-one attention when you give us a call at 1-800-672-4399. At Chewy we understand the important role dog food plays. Most of the nutrients your dog needs to stay strong and healthy comes from the food they eat. Chewy carries healthy dog food brands like Blue Buffalo dog food, Royal Canin dog food, Taste of the Wild dog food and Hill’s Prescription Diet dog food. We even carry grain-free dog food, limited ingredient dog food for pups with food allergies or sensitivities and diet dog food.
Dry dog food is great for the pup parent who is away all day. Dry dog kibble can be left out for your canine companion to snack on throughout the day without spoiling. Dry dog kibble can also be good for your dog’s teeth -crunchy kibble helps pups get rid of pesky plaque and tartar. Wet dog food often contains flavors and ingredients canines love. Freeze-dried dog food is another option, the limited ingredients in freeze-dried dog food varieties makes it a great dog food for sensitive stomachs or food allergies. And you may also consider feeding your pup dehydrated dog food. Dehydrated dog food is created by taking the whole foods found in a raw doggie diet, and slowly heating them until they’re dehydrated. An added bonus: Dehydrated dog food is easy to transport for pup parents who are on the go. And, frozen dog food is another great option. These doggie meals offer your pet the nutrition he was meant to consume in the wild and are rich in protein and typically contain less additives. Whether it’s dry kibble your dog desires or a grain-free wet food your canine craves, you can find this and more at Chewy's online pet store where you find the best dog supplies.

url: 'https://chewy.widget.custhelp.com/euf/rightnow/RightNow.Client.js',
dataType: 'script',
cache: true, //default for script is false
success: function(){
if (typeof RightNow !== 'undefined'){
$(function(){
$('.js-chewyChatLinkContainer').each(function(index, el) {
var rightNowChatContainer = $(el);
RightNow.Client.Controller.addComponent(
{
chat_login_page: "/app/chat/chat_launch",
chat_login_page_height: 560,
chat_login_page_width: 500,
container_element_id: rightNowChatContainer.id,

instance_id: "sccl_" + index,

wait_threshold: 1800,

enable_polling: false,

label_available_with_wait_template: "",
label_default: "",
label_unavailable_busy_template: "",
label_unavailable_hours: "",
module: "ConditionalChatLink",
type: 7
},
"https://chewy.widget.custhelp.com/ci/ws/get"
);
RightNow.Client.Event.evt_widgetLoaded.subscribe(chatWidgetLoaded);
function chatWidgetLoaded(type, args) {
if (args[0].name === "ConditionalChatLink" && args[0].id === "sccl_" + index)
{
var eventObj = new RightNow.Client.EventObject(args[0].name, args[0].id);
eventObj.data = {
customFields: {
// CustomField "139" for "referrer_url2"
"139": window.location.href.replace(/(^\w+:|^)\/\//, '') // removes protocol from url
}
};
RightNow.Client.Event.evt_updateWidgetData.fire(eventObj);
}
}
});
});
}
}

'top.GLOBALS',
//

'canvas.contentDocument',
'MyApp_RemoveAllHighlights',
'http://tt.epicplay.com',

'jigsaw is not defined',
'ComboSearch is not defined',
'http://loading.retry.widdit.com/',
'atomicFindClose',
//
'fb_xd_fragment',
//

'bmi_SafeAddOnload',
'EBCallBackMessageReceived',
//
'conduitPage'
],

//
/graph\.facebook\.com/i,
//
/connect\.facebook\.net\/en_US\/all\.js/i,
//
/eatdifferent\.com\.woopra-ns\.com/i,
/static\.woopra\.com\/js\/woopra\.js/i,
//
/extensions\//i,
/^chrome:\/\//i,
//
/127\.0\.0\.1:4001\/isrunning/i,  //
/webappstoolbarba\.texthelp\.com\//i,
/metrics\.itunes\.apple\.com\.edgesuite\.net\//i,
//
/kaspersky-labs\.com/i,
//
/sp\.analytics\.yahoo\.com/i,
//
/^\/signals\/config/i,
/magiczoomplus\.js/i,
/magiczoomplus\.5\.2\.4\.js/i
],
shouldSendCallback: function(data) {
//
//
//
//
if(window.chewyConf && window.chewyConf.isBot){
return false;
}
//
//
if(/CriOS/i.test(navigator.userAgent) && data.exception && data.exception.values){
//
for(var i = 0; i < data.exception.values.length; i++ ){
var e = data.exception.values[i];
if(e.type === 'SecurityError'
&& e.value.indexOf('Blocked a frame with origin') !== -1
&& e.value.indexOf('Protocols, domains, and ports must match.') !== -1){
return false;
}
}
}
//
//
if(window.location.search.indexOf("catchpoint=true") !== -1 ){
return false;
}
//TODO: filter out IE10 errors too.
var regexp = new RegExp('(\\s|^)ie-[89](\\s|$)');
//
if(document.body.className.match(regexp)){
return false;
}
return true;
},
//
sampleRate: 0.1,
serverName: 'iad1gsfw05.ecom.chewy.com',
release: 'hotfix-3.0-1227.3-1',
environment : 'production',
tags: {
viewType : 'desktop',

},
extra: {
rid: '42e46cff,03-5C80E51D-4750294',

}

Raven.setUserContext({id: '-1002'});
// optimizelyClient will be undefined if customer is running adblock extension
if (window.optimizelyClient) {
(function(){
//TODO: provide our own logger that hooks into Sentry
window.chewy.optimizelyClient = window.optimizelyClient.createInstance({
datafile: window.chewyConf.optimizely.dataFile,
logLevel: parseInt($.cookie('cw-optilog'), 10) || 4
});
// Get browser name and OS name
// TODO: Duplicated from UserAgentUtils.kt - don't update one without the other - figure out how to import
// from com.chew.sfweb.utils.UserAgentUtils without script-loader issues in jspf and legacy js files.
var agent = navigator.userAgent.toLowerCase();
var browserName = "Unknown";
var OSName = "Unknown";
if (agent.indexOf("opera") !== -1) browserName = "Opera";
else if (agent.indexOf("msie") !== -1) browserName = "MSIE";
else if (agent.indexOf("chrome") !== -1) browserName = "Chrome";
else if (agent.indexOf("safari") !== -1) browserName = "Safari";
else if (agent.indexOf("firefox") !== -1) browserName = "Firefox";
if (agent.indexOf("windows") !== -1) OSName = "Windows";
else if (agent.indexOf("mac") !== -1) OSName = "MacOS";
else if (agent.indexOf("x11") !== -1) OSName = "UNIX";
else if (agent.indexOf("linux") !== -1) OSName = "Linux";
var commonAttributes = {
'isVisitor': (!window.chewyConf.isBot && !window.chewyConf.csr && !window.chewyConf.intranetUser).toString(),
'viewType': chewyConf.viewType,
'hasPurchased': chewyConf.hasPurchased.toString(),
'registeredUser': chewyConf.registeredUser.toString(),
'environment': chewyConf.environment,
'utmSource': window.chewyConf.sessionAcquisitionData.utm_source || "",
'utmMedium': window.chewyConf.sessionAcquisitionData.utm_medium || "",
'utmCampaign': window.chewyConf.sessionAcquisitionData.utm_campaign || "",
'utmTerm': window.chewyConf.sessionAcquisitionData.utm_term || "",
'utmContent': window.chewyConf.sessionAcquisitionData.utm_content || "",
'activeAutoship': window.chewy.userHasActiveAutoship.toString(),
'browserType': browserName,
'os': OSName,
'referralURL': window.chewyConf.sessionAcquisitionData.referer || ""
};
var _mergedAttributes = function(attrs){
return $.extend({}, commonAttributes, attrs);
};
window.chewy.optimizelyClient.safeTrack = function (eventKey, attributes, eventTags) {
return this.track(eventKey, window.chewyConf.personalizationId, _mergedAttributes(attributes), eventTags);
};
window.chewy.optimizelyClient.safeActivate = function (experimentKey, attributes) {
// Short circuit if there is an override in place for this experiment. Prevents
// calling activate if an override is in place.
if (window.chewyConf.optimizely.experimentOverrides[experimentKey]){
return window.chewyConf.optimizely.experimentOverrides[experimentKey]
}
if(this.configObj.experimentKeyMap[experimentKey] === undefined){
return null;
}
var keyName = 'optimizelyVariant_' + experimentKey + '_' + window.chewyConf.personalizationId;
var isStorageAvailable = window.chewy.storageAvailable();
var variantEntry = isStorageAvailable ? JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(keyName)) : null;
if (!variantEntry) {
var variantValue = this.activate(experimentKey, window.chewyConf.personalizationId, _mergedAttributes(attributes));
if (variantValue == null) {
return null;
}
variantEntry = JSON.stringify({
value: variantValue,
time: Date.now()
});
// TODO: SFW-6217 use callback instead to decouple
if (window.chewy && window.chewy.gaHelper) {
window.chewy.gaHelper.pushExperiment(experimentKey, variantValue);
}
if (isStorageAvailable) localStorage.setItem(keyName, variantEntry);
return variantValue;
}
return variantEntry.value;
};
window.chewy.optimizelyClient.getSafeVariation = function (experimentKey, attributes) {
// if an override is set, just pass back the override
if (window.chewyConf.optimizely.experimentOverrides[experimentKey]){
return window.chewyConf.optimizely.experimentOverrides[experimentKey]
}
if(this.configObj.experimentKeyMap[experimentKey] === undefined){
return null;
}
return this.getVariation(experimentKey, window.chewyConf.personalizationId, _mergedAttributes(attributes));
};
})();
}

'ecomm_pagetype':'category',
'personalizationId': chewyConf.personalizationId,
'isBot': chewyConf.isBot,
'authenticationState': chewyConf.analyticsAuthenticationState,
});

};
function ecom(ecommerce, listData) {
// First send the impression event itself
var batchId = Math.round(Math.random() * 100000000);
var impressionsList = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(ecommerce.impressions));
delete ecommerce.impressions; // Send the impressions data in the batch loop instead
dataLayer.push({
event: 'analyticsEvent',
eventCategory: 'eec',
eventAction: 'impression',
eventLabel: 'browse',
eventNonInt: true,
ecommerce: ecommerce,
batchId: batchId,
'list-category': listData['list-category'],
'list-page-number': listData['list-page-number'],
resultCount: window.chewy.pageData.resultCount,
searchOutputKeyword : getSearchOutputKeyword(),
searchInputKeyword : getSearchInputKeyword()
});
// Setup the ecommerce batch object as a clone of the ecommerce object but with an empty impressions array
var ecommBatch = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(ecommerce));
ecommBatch.impressions = [];
// Next, loop through the ecommerse impression items and send in batches of ten as "sendData" events
impressionsList.forEach(item => {
ecommBatch.impressions.push(item);
if (ecommBatch.impressions.length >= 12) {
dataLayer.push({
event: 'analyticsEvent',
eventCategory: 'eec',
eventAction: 'impression',
eventLabel: 'sendData',
eventNonInt: true,
ecommerce: JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(ecommBatch)),
batchId: batchId,
'list-category': listData['list-category'],
'list-page-number': listData['list-page-number']
});
ecommBatch.impressions = [];
}
});
// Send the final batch
if (ecommBatch.impressions.length) {
dataLayer.push({
event: 'analyticsEvent',
eventCategory: 'eec',
eventAction: 'impression',
eventLabel: 'sendData',
eventNonInt: true,
ecommerce: JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(ecommBatch)),
'list-category': listData['list-category'],
'list-page-number': listData['list-page-number']
});
}
}
function catId() {
// SFW-7318 Use JSTL to see if property getter exists on bean, via exception catch
return '332';
}
function getSearchInputKeyword() {
var searchKeywordEl = document.querySelector('[data-input-keyword]');
return searchKeywordEl ? searchKeywordEl.getAttribute('data-input-keyword') : null;
}
// TODO: This will need to change to return the appropriate list (relaxed search results) output keywords when
// TODO: we work on SFW-8277 and SFW-8278
function getSearchOutputKeyword() {
var searchKeywordEl = document.querySelector('[data-output-keyword]');
return searchKeywordEl ? searchKeywordEl.getAttribute('data-output-keyword') : null;
}
var listData = {
'list-category': window.chewy.pageType + (catId() ? '-' + catId() : ''),
'list-page-number': '1'
};
dataLayer.push(listData);
setTimeout(function() { // Wait for DOM to finish constructing
var domNodes = [].slice.call(document.querySelectorAll('.js-product-select'));
var pageNumber = document.querySelector('.cw-pagination--is-active, .cw-pagination__current-page');
pageNumber = pageNumber ? pageNumber.innerText.split('/')[0].trim() : '1';
// For deals, if they exist on page, overwrite eventData with custom dimensions
eventData.impressions = eventData.impressions.map(function(product, index) {
if (domNodes && domNodes[index]) {
product['p-deals-flag'] = (domNodes[index].querySelector('.badge-sale, .sale') ? 'yes' : 'no');
var savingsPromo = '';
[].slice.call(domNodes[index].querySelectorAll('.savings-promo')).forEach(function(promo) {
savingsPromo += promo.innerText + ' ';
});
product['dimension19'] = savingsPromo.trim() || 'no';
product['dimension20'] = pageNumber;
}
return product;
});
ecom(eventData, listData);
}, 250); // Wait for DOM to finish constructing
})(window);

(function(w, d, s, l, i) {
w[l] = w[l] || [];
w[l].push({
"gtm.start": new Date().getTime(),
event: "gtm.js"
});
var f = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
j = d.createElement(s),
dl = l != "dataLayer" ? "&l=" + l : "";
j.async = true;
j.src =
"https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=" +
i +
dl +
"";
f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
})(window, document, "script", "dataLayer", "GTM-5X325N");

$(document).on('click', '.js-gtm-proceed-to-checkout-dynamic', function () {
var productsArray = [];
$('#gaCartDomParent .ga-eec__container').each(function (index, item) {
productsArray.push(window.chewy.gaHelper.buildProductFieldObject(item));
});
dataLayer.push({
'event': 'analyticsEvent',
'eventCategory': 'eec',
'eventAction': 'checkout',
'ec:action': 'checkout',
'eventLabel': undefined,
'eventNonInt': true,
'ecommerce': {
'checkout': {
'actionField': {
'step': 1
},
'products': productsArray
}
}
});
});

Dog Food
Your four-legged friend rewards you in many ways. Whether it’s accompanying you on a brisk jog to help you stay in shape, or giving you a cuddle when you need it most, there’s no denying how rewarding a pup can be. Show your appreciation and reward your furry friend with the foods and dog treats they crave.
Chewy carries a wide range of delicious dog foods and tasty dog treats for your precious pup. When it comes to choosing a dog food, you may find all the options overwhelming. Let us help you find the best one with dog food reviews, ingredient information, and personal one-on-one attention when you give us a call at 1-800-672-4399. At Chewy we understand the important role dog food plays. Most of the nutrients your dog needs to stay strong and healthy comes from the food they eat. Chewy carries healthy dog food brands like Blue Buffalo dog food, Royal Canin dog food, Taste of the Wild dog food and Hill’s Prescription Diet dog food. We even carry grain-free dog food, limited ingredient dog food for pups with food allergies or sensitivities and diet dog food.
Dry dog food is great for the pup parent who is away all day. Dry dog kibble can be left out for your canine companion to snack on throughout the day without spoiling. Dry dog kibble can also be good for your dog’s teeth -crunchy kibble helps pups get rid of pesky plaque and tartar. Wet dog food often contains flavors and ingredients canines love. Freeze-dried dog food is another option, the limited ingredients in freeze-dried dog food varieties makes it a great dog food for sensitive stomachs or food allergies. And you may also consider feeding your pup dehydrated dog food. Dehydrated dog food is created by taking the whole foods found in a raw doggie diet, and slowly heating them until they’re dehydrated. An added bonus: Dehydrated dog food is easy to transport for pup parents who are on the go. And, frozen dog food is another great option. These doggie meals offer your pet the nutrition he was meant to consume in the wild and are rich in protein and typically contain less additives. Whether it’s dry kibble your dog desires or a grain-free wet food your canine craves, you can find this and more at Chewy's online pet store where you find the best dog supplies.

window.criteo_q = window.criteo_q || [];
var deviceType = true;
switch (deviceType) { case (/Android/.test(navigator.userAgent)) : deviceType = 'Android'; break; case (/iPhone/.test(navigator.userAgent)) : deviceType = 'iPhone'; break; case (/iPad/.test(navigator.userAgent)) : deviceType = 'iPad'; break; default : deviceType = 'desktop'; }
window.criteo_q.push(
{ event: "setAccount", account: 5494},
{ event: "setData", ui_device: deviceType},
{ event: "viewList", item: [ '154551','46861','49069' ] }
);
$.ajax({
url: 'https://chewy.widget.custhelp.com/euf/rightnow/RightNow.Client.js',
dataType: 'script',
cache: true, //default for script is false
success: function(){
if (typeof RightNow !== 'undefined'){
$(function(){
$('.js-chewyChatLinkContainer').each(function(index, el) {
var rightNowChatContainer = $(el);
RightNow.Client.Controller.addComponent(
{
chat_login_page: "/app/chat/chat_launch",
chat_login_page_height: 560,
chat_login_page_width: 500,
container_element_id: rightNowChatContainer.id,
link_element_id: rightNowChatContainer.find('.js-chewyChatLink').attr('id'),
info_element_id: rightNowChatContainer.find('.js-chewyChatLinkInfo').attr('id'),
instance_id: "sccl_" + index,
min_sessions_avail: 0,
wait_threshold: 1800,
enable_availability_check: true,
enable_polling: false,
open_in_new_window: true,
label_available_immediately_template: "",
label_available_with_wait_template: "",
label_default: "",
label_unavailable_busy_template: "",
label_unavailable_hours: "",
module: "ConditionalChatLink",
type: 7
},
"https://chewy.widget.custhelp.com/ci/ws/get"
);
RightNow.Client.Event.evt_widgetLoaded.subscribe(chatWidgetLoaded);
function chatWidgetLoaded(type, args) {
if (args[0].name === "ConditionalChatLink" && args[0].id === "sccl_" + index)
{
var eventObj = new RightNow.Client.EventObject(args[0].name, args[0].id);
eventObj.data = {
customFields: {
// CustomField "139" for "referrer_url2"
"139": window.location.href.replace(/(^\w+:|^)\/\//, '') // removes protocol from url
}
};
RightNow.Client.Event.evt_updateWidgetData.fire(eventObj);
}
}
});
});
}
}
});
// do not trigger GTS inclusion in non-prod environments to prevent 404
if(window.chewyConf.environment === 'production'){
var gts = gts || [];
gts.push(["id", "483342"]);
gts.push(["badge_position", "USER_DEFINED"]);
gts.push(["badge_container", "GTS_CONTAINER"]);
gts.push(["locale", "en_US"]);
gts.push(["google_base_country", "US"]);
gts.push(["google_base_language", "en"]);
(function() {
var gts = document.createElement("script");
gts.async = true;
gts.src = "https://www.googlecommerce.com/trustedstores/api/js";
var s = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
s.parentNode.insertBefore(gts, s);
})();
} else {
//the fallback is to preserve layout structure across prod/non-prod
$('#GTS_CONTAINER').append('<div id="___ratingbadge_0" style="text-indent: 0; margin: 0; padding: 0; background: transparent; border-style: none; float: none; line-height: normal; font-size: 1px; vertical-align: baseline; display: inline-block; width: 165px; height: 54px;">');
}
